job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: pstrongWHO WE AREstrongppbrppTruth Initiative is Americas largest nonprofit public health organization dedicated to making tobacco use a thing of the past We speak seek and spread the truth about tobacco through education tobaccocontrol research and policy studies community activism and engagement and innovation in tobacco dependence treatmentppbrppThis position is part of the Innovations Center a crossfunctional team that designs builds evaluates and markets leading digital solutions to help people of all ages live tobacco free The EX Program is Truth Initiatives enterpriselevel digital tobacco cessation program designed for employers health systems and health plans Developed in collaboration with Mayo Clinic the EX Program is designed for tobacco users across the motivational continuum It supports users through multiple integrated modalities which include a website with an online social network wwwbecomeanexorg dynamically tailored text messaging email synchronous live chat digital coaching and pharmacotherapy decision support and delivery We provide value to our clients by helping their employeesmembers live healthier lives and demonstrating that value through a variety of reporting mechanisms Science is in our DNA In addition to delivering cessation solutions we conduct fieldleading federally funded research to advance the science of tobacco cessationppbrppYou will join the Innovations Software Development Team to design build and deploy novel approaches to reducing tobacco use The team is a small collaborative agile group where each developer has a significant impact on our products Developers early in their career have the opportunity to work with and learn from developers with a wealth of experienceppThis is a wonderful opportunity for developers who like to see their code through from idea to operation enjoy iterative improvements to software and processes and value roles where they help solve serious public health problems with softwarenbspWe value diversity of background and experienceppbrppstrongWHY WORK HEREstrongpulliThis work literally saves lives  our products help people quit a deadly and addictive habit that they want out of their lives and need help kickingliliOur workflow and systems are modern and well maintained we have CI frequent and easy releases excellent test coverage and a great culture of peer PRs and QAliliYou will have a significant impact we are growing our team and retooling to improve our core products and you will be able to shape that growth and the team itselfliliWe take care of you  our healthcare is excellent a PPO our vacation policy is well above industry standards and our 401K program includes a generous contribution not just a matchliulpbrppstrongPRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIESstrongpulliImprove and maintain the EX platform through full participation in the software development lifecycle  including architecture and design coding testing code review documentation and deploymentliliCollaborate with others outside of the development team to understand the problems propose solutions and verify deliveryliliWork directly on the product yourself by contributing code and developing featuresliliEnsure quality byliliWriting automated testsliliPeer testingliliPerforming peer code reviewliliUpdating documentationliulpbrppstrongPREFERRED QUALIFICATIONSstrongppYou should have some of these but certainly not all are requirednbspstrongnbspstrongpulliA minimum of 3 years development experience preferably in web developmentliliExperience with highlevel languages HTMLCSS and Javascript as well as familiarity with relational databases We use PythonDjango and PostgreSQL liliFamiliarity with basic version control concepts  preferably GitliliUnit testing experience andor enthusiasmliliYou love to learn and use new technologiesliliYou are looking for something more rewarding than just a web development job where the goal is to get more ad clicksliliYou like working collaboratively on a team and welcome feedback on code reviewsliliBonus points ifliliYou consider yourself excellent at any of our major technologies Python Django PostgreSQL MySQL Git Heroku Wagtail CMS or CeleryRabbitMQliliYouve deployed code into productionliliYou have frontend experience JSCSS beyond a typical backend developerliulpbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanCOMPENSATION PACKAGEstrongppCompetitive salarynbspwithstrongnbspEXCELLENTstrongnbspbenefitsnbspppbrppInterested candidates should submit their cover letter and resume hereppORppmail application materials toppHuman ResourcesppstrongAttn Software Engineerstrongpp900 G Street NWppFourth FloorppWashington DCnbsp20001ppFax 202 4545597ppnbspppstrongNo telephone calls pleasestrongppstrongAll qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race color religion sex sexual orientation gender identity national origin veteran status or
